description: A great spring or summer salad to accompany a BBQ meal.
name: Asparagus & Ham Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl combine all ingredients together and mix in the salad dressing. Ensuring that everything gets coated.
